template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a multi-case customer support automation workflow for a {business_type} that involves triage, automatic resolution of simple issues, escalation of complex cases, and performance tracking; output only the prompt text under 40 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a multi-case customer support automation workflow for a retail chain that involves triage, automatic resolution of simple issues, escalation of complex cases, and performance tracking; output only the prompt text under 40 words.

message.content: Create a retail customer support workflow that auto-resolves simple queries, escalates complex cases, and tracks performance metrics.
message.reasoning_content:
Hmm, the user wants a concise prompt under 40 words describing a retail support automation workflow with specific components. Let me break down the requirements: triage, auto-resolution for simple issues, escalation for complex cases, and performance tracking. 

I need to ensure all four elements are included while keeping it natural-sounding. The word limit is tight, so avoiding fluff is key. Maybe start with the workflow's purpose, then list the components in a logical flow. 

"Retail customer support workflow" sets the context. "Auto-resolves simple queries" covers triage and resolution. "Escalates complex cases" handles escalation. "Tracks performance metrics" completes the tracking part. That’s 17 words—fits the limit and captures everything.
